sentences.en: Beloved, you love me, irrigate at heart finally have put out.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的, 你对我的爱, 灌溉入我的心房,最终生根发芽.

sentences.en: Can irrigate when basin earth is particularly dry a few water.
sentences.cn: 盆土非凡干燥时可浇少量的水.

sentences.en: He also wants to use the water to irrigate barren desert land.
sentences.cn: 他也想用这些水灌溉荒漠。

sentences.en: Maintenance is to apply fertilizer, to uproot grasses and to irrigate it.
sentences.cn: 经营就是施肥 、 锄草和灌溉.

sentences.en: Plant, fertilize, cultivate, spray, irrigate and harvest crops.
sentences.cn: 种植, 施肥, 培育, 喷洒, 灌溉和收获作物.

sentences.en: Some plains rivers regularly fertillize and irrigate surrounding areas with their floods.
sentences.cn: 有些平源河流不断地以其洪水培肥和灌溉着周围的地区.

sentences.en: The farmer dug several trenches to irrigate the rice fields.
sentences.cn: 这个农民挖了好几条沟以灌溉稻田.

sentences.en: The field is convenient to irrigate as it is by the river.
sentences.cn: 这片疆埸临着小河,灌溉很方便.

sentences.en: The only energy needed is to pump out to irrigate.'Mr.
sentences.cn: 唯一需要能源的地方就是将净化后的水抽吸出来用于灌溉.

sentences.en: The water in Lake Powell is used to irrigate the area.
sentences.cn: 包尔湖的水被用来灌溉该地区。

sentences.en: They are already discovering how to colonise Venus and to irrigate the moon.
sentences.cn: 他们正在探索如何殖民于金星,和如何灌溉月球.

sentences.en: They have built canals to irrigate the desert.
sentences.cn: 他们建造成水渠以灌溉沙漠.

sentences.en: They irrigate their crops with water from this river.
sentences.cn: 他们引这条河里的水灌溉庄稼.

sentences.en: Water drafted from the well will be used to irrigate the field.
sentences.cn: 从井中汲取的水将被用来灌溉田地.

sentences.en: Water to irrigate farmland, to bring us food.
sentences.cn: 水可以灌溉农田, 为我们带来粮食.

words.tran_cn: 灌溉；[临床] 冲洗；冲洗法

trans.tran_cn: 灌溉, 修水利, 冲洗伤口, 使潮湿
trans.tran_en: to supply land or crops with water
